main event: An observer driving a car in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, witnessed a bright light resembling a star that changed colors from red to white and was silent.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at night under clear conditions., The observer estimated the object's speed to be around 15-20,000 miles per hour., The object appeared to be about 1/2 mile to 1 mile away., The observer described the object as having a star-like appearance and compared its brightness to that of a plane., The observer did not have any other witnesses with them at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light that resembled a star
